data.title: Been to MANY Sizzler's, this is one of the best!
data.text: This Sizzler has been here a LONG time! I first came here in the early 80's! We have a closer one that we usually go to, but when I came back to this one, I was very pleased and surprised! I have been to ALL the Sizzler's in my large area and have found that they are not all exactly the same. This Sizzler offers MANY more items in their salad bar than our usual one and also offers different specialty drink items that the other did not. It was also more modern and kept up. It has flat screens and prettier decor as well as better furniture. It even has an outdoor dining patio. The staff is very attentive and very friendly. The proximity of this restaurant to the mall in West Covina is probably why they are so on top of their game. Many shoppers come here after shopping and want a good dining experience after the mall rat-race. The entrees are always prepared fresh and if you ever have a problem, their management always helps to fix the problem or correct things in order to make things better. It is usually not busy and we don't have to wait. Try not to go on Fridays and Saturdays in the late afternoon for dinner because it gets VERY crowded. You will definitely wait in line. Also, if it is crowded and you are only a party of two and if you wish more room, INSIST on a larger booth and NOT a cramped little two seat space! That is your right to be comfortable. Aside from that, this is a great location with a very reasonably priced menu. I highly recommend this location for a good lunch or dinner. Try it out. It is worth it!

data.title: Beware!
data.text: The location in West Covina uses deceptive and misleading practices when pricing and when you upgrade your entree selection. This is not representative of the Sizzler brand

data.title: Great for kids and parents
data.text: Lots of food Steaks. But open serve bar areas where kids are allowed to touch and be coughing around. Lots of food to pick from.

data.title: Sizzler's Buffet
data.text:
Husband and I wanted a good salad bar for dinner so we went to this Sizzler because we were in the area.  There was no waiting and seating was plentiful.  The gentleman who took our order and money was very polite.  We chose a table and then went to the salad bar to get started.  They had plenty of greens and things for salad.  They had a few types of soup so we got some of the potato soup thinking it was clam chowder.  The actual soup was flavored wonderfully but the potato's were a bit on the hard side.  The cheese bread, as always, was very good.  A disappointment tho was that they didn't have any chicken wings or anything like that,,,, only taco fixings and fillings and tortilla chips for nacho cheese.  Normally Sizzlers that we go to have chicken wings, meatballs, pasta and sauce, plus the taco filling and tortilla chips.
The best part of the meal was a baby girl that was with a family a few tables away.  She was absolutely adorable and her grandpa was proudly holding her.  
We might go back if we are in the area again but hopefully they will have some extra things on the salad bar.
Oh, and our waitress was a good one !

data.title: A Family Favorite
data.text:
Very tasty and the salad bar is always good. They have several dinner options that include the salad bar, called value meals. Otherwise, last night three of the four of us ordered the specials they have right now that are $9.99 and they include two main dish options on each plate and a side dish. For an additional $5.99, we can chat at the salad bar. I ordered steak and Malibu Chicken, my husband the steak and shrimp scampi, and one of my kids the steak and hand battered chicken tenders. It was all very tasty, we actually brought the majority of the plate meals home and will be able to have that for lunch or dinner on another day. The waiter service last night wasn't as attentive as it usually is. All the other staff is very friendly. The manager stopped by each take to say hello. 

Advice on ordering steak: Unless you like your steak very, very red and bloody, don't order it rare. Most other places, I'm able to order it rare, but not here. Medium rare is what I order here. My son thought he would give it a shot and ordered rare, and it was just far too red.

data.title: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE!
data.text: My husband and I have been going to Sizzler for decades!  We had an experience this evening that I had to share.  We are both members of the Sizzler Real Deal Club, and we both received an e-mail thanking us for our loyalty and inviting us to have one Free Malibu Chicken Entrée.  We printed out the e-mail as stated and went to our local Sizzler.  After waiting in a long line to place our order, the cashier stared at the e-mail for a while and then told us that she had to check with her manager.  Her manager came out from the back and told us that they could not accept these e-mails, as we needed to print out coupons.  I explained that there wasn’t a coupon and that the e-mail actually said “Please print and present this entire email at your favorite Sizzler restaurant.”   She still would not accept the e-mail.  Also, she said we could only use one coupon IF we, in fact, printed out the non-existent coupon.  Nowhere on this e-mail does it state that we could only use one coupon per party!  We were embarrassed, humiliated, and made to feel like criminals in front of a long line of customers.  We will NEVER eat at Sizzler again after this awful experience!  Just wanted to share with all of you and hope that you don’t have to go through this.

data.title: Best Sizzler in the area!
data.text: We have been coming to this particular Sizzler for YEARS! The staff is always friendly and the food is always good. They recently revamped their menu, added some new items to the salad bar and put in a new ice cream machine. All you can eat cheese bread and salad bar are always good. For the price, they serve a pretty good lobster and steak. We have always been seated quickly and there never is a wait. Definitely try it!

data.title: The BEST Sizzler ever!!!
data.text: Diana C, could you have been at the one on Citrus?  This one on West Covina Parkway was excellent.  Service and quality.  The Steaks melted in our mouths, and baked potato stayed hot through out the meal.  I didn't care for the Guacamole either, but I am very picky where that is concerned, the chips were yummy.  The garlic bread was out of this world.  Even the coffee was good.  HOWEVER, was shocked to see they charged for the salad bar with the senior meals, first time they weren't included, but ...... then I observed the seniors and the helpings, and I understood, we never go more than once to the salad bar, we were in the minority.  As far as kids running around, there were none when we were there, that would have changed everything, I do not understand how parents are allowed to let their children loose in a buffet.  It is disgusting.

data.title: Quality not like it was
data.text: Went there for my birthday. Disappointed. Quality is going down. Not likely to return to this one again. Salad bar was always a favorite but salt level so high in the chicken wings my husband got a headache. Guacamole so overly filled with lemon juice to keep it from turning brown it no longer taste like guacamole. Bleu cheese dressing was as thick as paste breaking the leaves of lettuce. How can you mess up a salad bar so much. Then management has NO courage to stand up to the parents who let their children run wild, screaming at the top of their lungs like squealing monkeys ruining any semblance of any enjoyable dinner. Then the most disgusting allowing children to go to the dessert bar and serve themselves by putting their hands in the toppings and applying them to their food. Licking their fingers and putting the top of the syrup containers in their food that has already been partially eaten. Everybody sees it happening and keeps silent. Waitresses say nothing just keep walking while these children take control. Please keep your monsters at home if you are not willing to properly train and discipline them. You have lost business from a now steady customers. NEVER THERE AGAIN. I will go to any other one first. Hopefully they will be better.

data.title: 5 star customer service @ Sizzler.
data.text:
Exceptional customer service started when Andrea welcomed us 
into Sizzler.  Andrea assisted us with the ordering process, and after she took our order, she even carried our tray to our table, then Andrea introduced our server, Phillip to us.  Philip continued the great customer service.  He collected used salad plates, bringing clean plates, came back to us several times to see if we needed anything else.  I felt very well taken care of. Thank you!

data.title: Comida quase igual a nossa
data.text: Foi um dos lugares aonde comi e me senti mais próximo da comida brasileira, tem varios tipos de salada, entre outros pratos.
